attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i find it ridiculous that we can invade and control iraq under the gise of humanitarian issus, yet when a viscious dictater like robert mugabe destroys his own people we sit back and do nothing...what no oil there?...no proffit in zimbabwe? if there are crooks in this world there all at the top. politicians are the biggest of all people want to do something politicians don't give a toss, what if it was your kids.....free zimbabwe.....PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
